evidence.text: "settlement" appears in the Opinion but no duration or monitoring period is indicated. The excerpt reads: "…the amicable settlement of disputes between workers and their employers involving conditions of employment."

evidence.text: "settlement" appears in the Emergency Motion for an Immediate Administrative Stay and Stay Pending Appeal but without any associated duration. The excerpt reads: "…the settlement of disputes…" without a time period.
Searches for settlement durations (e.g., "will last", "duration", "for a period of", "for \d+ years") returned no matches across all documents.
